com.chdryra.android.reviewer

Class ControllerReview<T extends Review>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chdryra.android.reviewer.ControllerReview<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControllerReviewEditable, ControllerReviewNode

     class ControllerReview<T extends Review>
extends java.lang.Object
    Translation and indirection layer between Model (review data) and View (android). The "C" in the MVC pattern. The View layer consist of the activities and fragments in android.

    Not a "Controller" as such - more of an adapter - but didn't want to confuse with Android's use of the word "Adapter". Translates between model data types and view data types:

    • Model data type: Review types and the data they return
    • View data type: GVData types, java types

    See Also:
    Review, GVData
